page.title: 06Sister Andrew Joseph.
page.content: {Nazareth House}stands stately on Lasswade Brae just outside{Bonnyrigg.} Any visitors to{Nazareth House}are always met cordially by{Sister Andrew {Joseph,}a kind and gentle figure, who has been connected with{Nazareth House for just two years. She worked for a great length of time in Aberdeen before moving south to{Nazareth}House. This building has kept its name for 54 years. Previously it was called{Eldin House.}When { {Sister Andrew Joseph}arrived it was an {Orphanage }but the Authorities put the children into private fostering. {Sister Andrew Joseph }now answers the phone and welcomes visitors who come to {Nazareth House, }as well as caring for elderly people who now live there.{Sister Andrew Joseph}has dedicated her life to caring for young and old. Jennifer Mcguire.
